column2: "Na Israelmba no
column3: mekyerɛ mboanofo no nyina
column4: baa Zin sar do wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no mu: na ɔman no tsenaa Kades; na Miriam wui wɔ hɔ

column2: "Nna nsu nnyi hɔ mma mboanofo no: na wohyiaa hɔnho hyiae tsiaa Moses nye Aaron."
"Na ɔman no nye Moses hamee
column3: na wɔkaa dɛ
column4: Ka hɛn nko a nkyɛ ber a hɛn nuanom wuwui wɔ EWURADZE enyim no hɛn so yewuwui!"

column2: "Na ebɛn ntsi na hom dze EWURADZE bagua aba sar yi do
column3: dɛ yembowuwu wɔ ha

column2: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ayɛ ma yeefi Egypt efir
column3: dɛ hom dze hɛn reba bea bɔn yi do yi? Ɔnnyɛ abadua
column6: anaa pɔmegranate eduaba bea: nkyii so nsu mpo a wɔnom bi nnyi hɔ."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron fii bagua no enyim kɔr ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano
column3: na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw hɔ: na EWURADZE enyimnyam yii noho edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column8: na hom nkasa nkyerɛ ɔbotan no wɔ hɔn enyim
column9: ma ɔmma no nsu; na yi ɔbotan no mu nsu ma hɔn: ma mboanofo no nye hɔn mbowa nnom."

column2: "Na Moses faa poma no fii EWURADZE enyim
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron boaboaa bagua no ano wɔ ɔbotan no enyim
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: hom asoɔdzenfo; ana yɛntwe ɔbotan yi mu nsu mma hom?"

column2: "Na Moses maa ne nsa do
column3: na ɔdze no poma no bɔɔ ɔbotan no mpɛn ebien: na nsu fiir edzi baa pii
column4: na mboanofo no nye hɔn mbowa nomee."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ hom anngye me enndzi
column4: ammfa anntsew mo ho wɔ Israelmba enyim mu ntsi
column5: hom remmfa bagua yi nndu asaase a medze ama hɔn no do."

column2: "Iyi nye Meriba nsu no; osiandɛ Israelmba nye EWURADZE hamee
column3: na ɔtseew noho wɔ hɔn mu."

column2: "Na Moses somaa abɔfo fii Kades kɔr Edomhen hɔ dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ wo nua Israel se nye yi
column4: Woara inyim ɔhaw a aba hɛn do nyinara:"

column2: "mbrɛ hɛn egyanom dze sianee kɔr Egypt
column3: na yɛdze tsenaa Egypt mber tsentsen; na Egyptfo yɛɛ hɛn

column2: "na yesui frɛɛ EWURADZE a
column3: otsiee hɛn ndze
column5: na oyii hɛn fii Egypt no: na
column7: kurow a ɔwɔ wo ntoaado noho no mu:"

column2: "meserɛ wo
column3: ma yentwa mu mfa w’asaase do: yerunntwa mu mmfa haban anaa wenyin ture mu
column4: nkyii so yɛronnom bura mu nsu bi: yɛbɛfa ɔhen ne tsempɔn do ara akɔ
column6: ekodu dɛ yeetwa mu wɔ wo ntoaado."

column2: "Na Edom see no dɛ
column3: Mma mmbɛfa mo mu
column4: bɛyɛ na medze nkrantsee efir edzi ebehyia wo."

column2: "Na Israelmba no see no dɛ
column3: Yɛrebɛfa ɔtsempɔn do akɔ: na sɛ hɛn nye hɛn mbowa nom wo nsu bi a
column5: ma yɛmfa hɛn anamɔn ara mbotwa mu."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mma hom nntwa mu. Na Edom dze nkorɔfo pii
column4: nye nsa a ɔyɛ dzen fiir edzi behyiaa hɔn."

column2: "Dɛm na Edom poow dɛ ɔma Israel kwan wɔ no ntoaado: dɛm ntsi Israel danee fii noho."
"Na wotui fii Kades: na Israelmba no
column3: mekyerɛ mboanofo no nyina

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron wɔ bepɔw Hor ho
column3: wɔ Edom asaase ntoaado dɛ
column5: "Ɔnnkɛkyɛr na Aaron akɛka no nkorɔfo ho wɔ nsamankyir: na ɔronnkɔ asaase a medze ama Israelmba no do
column6: osiandɛ hom yɛɛ asoɔdzen wɔ m’asɛm do wɔ Meriba nsu ho."

column2: "Fa Aaron nye ne babanyin Eleazar
column3: na fa hɔn fow bepɔw Hor:"

column2: "na pɔr Aaron ne ntar no
column3: na fa hyɛ ne babanyin Eleazar: na onwu wɔ hɔ nkɛka no nkorɔfo ho."

column2: "Na Moses yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛe no: na wɔfoow bepɔw Hor wɔ mboanofo no nyinara enyim."
"Na Moses pɔɔr Aaron ne ntar no
column3: na ɔdze hyɛɛ ne babanyin Eleazar; na Aaron wui wɔ bepɔw no etsifi hɔ: na Moses nye Eleazar fii bepɔw no do sianee."

column2: "Na aber a mboanofo no nyinara hun dɛ Aaron ewu no
column3: wosuu Aaron adaduasa
